name: ia-image-generator
description: AI Image Generator - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.dev:windows: start "Backend" cmd /c "npm run dev:backend" && start "Frontend" cmd /c "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
